attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: URGE THE LOCAL AUTHORITES TO MAKE THE TRAFFIC LIGHT SYSTEM MORE EFFICENT,LESS TIME WASTING,LESS CONGESTION AND FREE UP OUR ROADS

rejection.details:
There are several petitions on this issue already
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=traffic+lights
Also, please note that if you decide to reword and resubmit the title of the petition must be a call for action, not your name, and do not use BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
